# Examples

This folder contains small, runnable examples for the public API.

## basic_pipeline.py

End-to-end flow: clean -> normalize -> sentence/word tokenization -> stopword removal.

```bash
python examples\basic_pipeline.py
```

## stopword_policies.py

Shows how to use StopwordConfig presets and a custom policy.

```bash
python examples\stopword_policies.py
```
